message.body: ...they lowered the amount of snow we're supposed to get. Now it's only 12-16 inches. Yesterday the weather channel said 14-24. I'm so sad.
Lol do you still have class? A lot of places have closed or have early dismissal
Yeah. Probably (hopefully) won't tomorrow.
Hopefully
Alright. My guilty pleasure has to be one direction....mainly harry styles' voice. I'm listening to night changes and his voice is feels like eating chocolate.
*voice feels
Hahahaha
No wonder t-swift likes him. Although I think he's a little strange looking, his voice is ahhhhmazing.
Do you remember what the log-in for gwynedd mercy is?! I can't find it anywhere!
The website.

Nevermind. I found it. It's a $30 application fee. They only waived the undergraduate entry fee. They said you're supposed to get the info of where to send it and how to do it from the admissions counselor when he/she calls. Haha.
Pfffft
I know.
I sent another microbio handout
Lol okay
Another girl stole the seat of the girl I made friends with....I am once again alone
Awwww

This girl also just said that professors get paid to write recommendations. She's mad because her prof wouldn't cause he didn't know her well enough. She said "like seriously, we pay all this money so that they can write us a recommendation later on." I thought they got paid to teach.
She crazy lol

This idiot on the train just put my $20 on the ticket clip and walked away. So I took it off because I didn't want someone to just take it. This freaking jerkoff just scolded me for taking the money off. He then proceeded to tell me to put it back and walked away again. Wtf is up with that?! I'm seriously biting my tongue to a point where I think it might be bleeding.
We're in the corner of 8th and spruce.
Well this was the biggest let down EVER!
I know right?!
Villanova at least gave a delay. 10:00.
Lol that's good I guess
Not good enough. Pshaw, why couldn't we live in NYC.
